original_title: เพราะรัก..ไม่จำกัดความ
overview: "Jane" and "Por" two beautiful girls, that must be dated secretly because Por doesn't want her mother acknowledges that she has homosexual love.  Although, Por and Jane live together under an agreement to conceal this secret smoothly, deep inside Jane's heart still have hope wanting to let Por reveal this love without having to care about anyone's eyes anymore.  And finally, it's time for Por to dare to tell her the truth. What will the story be like?

production_companies.name: หนุกสารพัดนึก

title: The Greatest Love
